award_title: Structural and Functional Properties of Enzymes Involved in Persulfide Degradation
subject: Training the next generation
body:
Holly,

When grad students build computational tools, they often disappear after publicationâ€”buried in a methods section, hard to find or reuse.

Ouro makes those tools discoverable and citable. When someone reuses code from your lab, your students' names travel with it. Their contributions become visible, durable infrastructure.

Might be worth a look, especially with students learning analytical techniques.

Would you be open to a quick chat in the new year?

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
